. More or less a one horse (yak) town complete with Tibetan truck stop and curious and friendly gazzing nomads. Perhaps the most exotically Tibetan destination you will find in West Sichuan. Must see.
At 3800m in the middle of nowhere!

value: address=13 Km West from town Near the road that goes to Dege

content=A clear and nice Lake. You can hire a horse in the lake, or come from town with a horse- takes 2-4 hours of Beautiful riding.
you can also take a taxi from town or just walk or hitch hike.

content=A good way to see the countryside around the town.
One nice option is to ride to Yihun Lhatso- A nice Lake 13 Km from town.
The owner at Pani Hotel can Help organize horses and guides - His wife\Daughter Understands a little english.

The truck stop will set you with the standard noodles and yak butter or Chinese tea.
there ate plenty cheap Options, but most of them don't have running water or a bathroom.

value: directions=On The road that goes to Dege 300m Up from the Main fork

content=The Biggest hotel in town. Common Bathroom Smells, No shower.
The owner can help you organize Horse treks.
directions=On The road that goes to Dege 100m Up from the Main fork
price=30 RMB for a bed in a four bed dorm

content= . This new guesthouse is located coveniently in the centre of Manigango. There is a shared toilet and free wifi available. The staff speaks some English, more than enough to get around. (May 2013)
